con:config.con:query: Select person_contact_method.PROTOCOL_VALUE From person_contact_method Where person_contact_method.PERSON_ID = (Select users.PERSON_ID From users Where users.USER_ID = (Select pcc_user.USER_ID From pcc_user Where pcc_user.PC_COORDINATION_ID = (Select patient_care_coordination.PC_COORDINATION_ID From patient_care_coordination Where patient_care_coordination.PATIENT_EPISODE_DOC_KEY = :ep_key And patient_care_coordination.SERVICE_APP_ID = (Select service_app.SERVICE_APP_ID From service_app Where service_app.SERVICE_APP_NAME = 'DISCHARGE') And pcc_user.IS_OWNER = 'Y'))) And person_contact_method.PROTOCOL_CODE = 'WORK_PHONE'

select first_name,last_name from users where user_id = (select USER_ID from pcc_user where pc_coordination_id =(select PC_COORDINATION_ID from patient_care_coordination where patient_episode_doc_key= :ep_key and service_app_id = (select SERVICE_APP_ID from service_app where service_app_name = 'DISCHARGE') and is_owner = 'Y'))
